abstract: Reporting strong quarterly profits, Goldman wants to extricate itself from government control six months after taking funds.
snippet: Reporting strong quarterly profits, Goldman wants to extricate itself from government control six months after taking funds.
lead_paragraph: Six months after accepting a financial lifeline from Washington, a newly profitable Goldman Sachs is pushing to return the billions of taxpayer dollars that it received in an effort to extricate itself from heightened government control.

headline.main: Goldman Posts Profit and Plans Share Sale
headline.print_headline: Goldman Profit Tops Forecast, and a Share Sale Is Planned
